Frequently Asked Questions
  • Q: What is BUDA?

    A: BUDA stands for Behavioral User-driven Deceptive Activities. BUDA is a cutting-edge experimental cybersecurity solution designed to automate the simulation of realistic user behaviors within decoy environments.

  • Q: How do I create a narrative?

    Go to the Narrative Management section, fill in the form, and create it. The Narrative act as the strategic backbone of the deception operation.

  • Q: How can I generate a user profile?

    Use the User Profile section to create every simulated identity used in your environment. These profiles mimic real users

  • Q: How do I upload context?

    The process begins by integrating real-world environmental data into BUDA through Global Context. This involves uploading EVTX logs to extract information.
